text: Quick question, working on dynamic pages, is there a way to preview a "row" page before the dynamic page is actually published? Table is up to date, just need to preview the individual version. Tried &hubdb_row_id={row_id} but I'm still getting the listing view. Don't have access to publishing pages or content staging right now and I'd like to avoid going back to the client for more rights when I just need a way to preview the template.

<@U26BLKGE4> we’ve done the pages and set the values for the dynamic rows to be able to be a specific hubdb row by Id as a query on the listing layout. Takes some work for setting alternate criteria but it’s worked a couple times that we needed it
We just omitted the hs_path value to prevent it from showing dynamically
Lol, that's exactly what I ended up doing <@U25C65C3S>, thanks for the response
